languages.text: "Как прикажете! Я также распоряжусь, чтобы часовню привели в порядок".
"As you command! I will order the chapel be restored as well."
languages.original_text: "Как прикажете! Я также распоряжусь, чтобы часовню привели в порядок".

traits.locale_text: "As you command! I will also have the chapel restored."
"As you command! I will also have the chapel restored."
"As you command! I will order the chapel be restored as well."
"As you command! I will order the chapel be restored as well."
"As you command! I will order the chapel be restored as well."
"As you command! I will order the chapel be restored as well."

languages.text: "Wie Ihr befehlt! Ich werde zudem die Renovierung der Kapelle anordnen."
languages.original_text: "As you command! I will order the chapel be restored as well."

traits.locale_text: "Wie Ihr befehlt! Ich werde zudem die Renovierung der Kapelle anordnen."

languages.text: «¡A sus órdenes! Mandaré que la capilla sea restaurada también».
languages.original_text: "As you command! I will order the chapel be restored as well."

traits.locale_text: «¡A sus órdenes! Mandaré que la capilla sea restaurada también».

languages.text: 「ご命令のままに！礼拝堂の修復も指示しておきますね」
languages.original_text: "As you command! I will order the chapel be restored as well."

traits.locale_text: 「ご命令のままに！礼拝堂の修復も指示しておきますね」

languages.text: “遵命，大人！我也会让人把礼拜堂修好。”
languages.original_text: "As you command! I will order the chapel be restored as well."

traits.locale_text: “遵命，大人！我也会让人把礼拜堂修好。”

languages.text: « Il en sera fait selon votre volonté. Je vais également donner ordre de restaurer la chapelle. »
languages.original_text: "As you command! I will order the chapel be restored as well."

traits.locale_text: « Il en sera fait selon votre volonté. Je vais également donner ordre de restaurer la chapelle. »

languages.original_text: "As you command! I will order the chapel be restored as well."
